snippet.title: World's Worst Handyman Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Help our clumsy handyman, Doug, “repair” items, dodge workplace hazards, and solve puzzles to earn the cash he needs to save his local animal shelter in this slapstick-stealth-sandbox game. 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1333930/Worlds_Worst_Handyman/

#WorldsWorstHandyman #Steam #PC

Follow us on Social Media for updates!

Website- http://www.graffitigames.com/
